## Checklist

- [ ] I have added a `changelog/*` label to this PR
- [ ] PR title follows the format: `[resource_name] Description` (unless using `changelog/note` or `changelog/no-changelog`)
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] I have run `go generate ./...` and committed any generated file changes
- [ ] I have run `tfplugindocs generate` and committed any documentation changes
- [ ] I have updated the examples if applicable
- [ ] All tests pass locally with `go test -v ./...`
- [ ] Linter passes with `golangci-lint run`
